name: White Stratus
tag_list: cloud-computing, real-time, enterprise, software, enterprise-cloud-solutions, google-apps-provider, cloud, google-apps, google-app-engine, saas, iaas, paas
overview:
White Stratus is a Global Google Partner, specializing in helping Google’s largest customers transform their enterprises to take advantage of the Apps platform. We focus 100% on Google technologies, and our expertise covers strategic planning, technical development and change management services. We have direct offices in 5 countries (USA, UK, Amsterdam, Japan, Australia) and solution delivery centers in regions like Kentucky, USA and Eastern Europe, to ensure cost effective delivery of our expertise. Customers like Ahold, Burberry, Trinity Mirror and Sealed Air trust White Stratus to help them drive value from their Google Apps platform.

Our core offerings include:

Google Transformation Diagnostics - For large enterprises with thousands of employees, understanding the benefits of moving to Google Apps and how to get there can be daunting. Our experts have deep experience executing IT platform consolidation analysis to quantify real benefits, running end user workshops to validate business transformation opportunities and crafting multi-phase IT roadmaps to manage your journey.

Google Apps deployments - Our specialist technology, change and project management teams have experience deploying hundreds of thousands of Google Apps seats worldwide. With combined expertise from offices around the globe, we can bring the necessary personnel to bear the right depth and breadth of skills for every situation.

Global Enterprise Support - For existing Google customers, White Stratus offers our Google Concierge Service - 24x7 support with enterprise SLA’s, dedicated Technical Account Managers (TAM) and multiple contact channels. Our Rapid Response Team provides instant analysis on material enhancements to the Google service from a business and technical perspective. Wondering how the next release of Google+ will impact you, or how other large customers are responding? Talk to us.

Apps Development Lab - Our Apps development team architects and implements solutions on the Google App Engine platform to extend the native capabilities Google provides. We also integrate to on premise solutions and other cloud apps such as Salesforce, Zendesk, AWS, RunMyProcess and others. Whether Corporate Communications needs a secure, stand-alone version of Google+, HR wants to automate document transitions at offboarding, or marketing wants to dynamically update signature messages with the latest promotions, our Apps Development team is standing by to assist.

Thought Leadership - White Stratus authors multiple White Papers each year focusing on the latest techniques and insights in the Google Apps world. Google’s leading global customers trust White Stratus. Chat with us now on info@whitestratus.com to understand why.
